See <https://bellecp.github.io/597-Data-Wrangling-Spring-2024/project.html#store-your-data-in-at-least-3-different-formats-e.g.-sqlite3-csv-excel>.

The pandas dataframe was converted ans saved in 3 formats :

We saved the dataframe to csv by using to_csv function and the file was saved as SCA.csv

We saved the dataframe to excel by using to_excel function and the file was saved as SCA.xlsx

We saved the dataframe to JSON file by using to_json function and the file was saved as SCA.json
